thread.title: Snickers had a live Super Bowl commercial where everything went (intentionally) wrong
thread.title_full: Snickers had a live Super Bowl commercial where everything went (intentionally) wrong

author: James Dator
title: Snickers had a live Super Bowl commercial where everything went (intentionally) wrong
text: Rec Snickers did something incredibly risky for their Super Bowl commercial: they shot it live. The ad, featuring Star Wars and Girls star Adam Driver, was a wild west scene where everything went wrong. There was a nice touch at the top of the commercial where one of the cast asked Driver the score at halftime, at which point he quickly responded “21 to 3, Atlanta” -- a nice tip of the cap proving the whole thing really happened. Rigging the set to fall down perfectly on cue live was super impressive and the logistics were something else. Next Up In ##Lookit
